active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a post-incident forensic investigation, how long should revoked remote access certificates be retained? Debate trade-offs between NIST AU-12 audit retention requirements (e.g., 3-12 months minimum, up to 7 years), storage costs, and legal holds under regulations like GDPR (up to 10 years for accountability) or HIPAA (6 years for PHI-related records). Use compare/contrast with non-retention risks such as impeded investigations or compliance violations.
